definition: Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479), with capital at Nanjing
(classical) a type of battle-ax/to kill/to slaughter
surname Song/the Song dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of the Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
Song of the Southern dynasties (420-479), with capital at Nanjing

sentences.english: These resulted from the gradual intensification of imperial power starting from the middle period of Song Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 诸如此者，皆与皇权自刘宋中叶以降渐趋强化有关。

sentences.english: The consciousness of time and life was main melody of the poetry images from the Wei8c Jin to the Liu Song Dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 时间与生命意识是魏晋至刘宋时代诗歌意象的主旋律。

sentences.english: Two obvious periods of the principal contradictions in the ruling clique of Liu Song Dynasty could be seen.
sentences.chinese: 刘宋统治集团内部主要矛盾分为两个时期。

definition: Song of the Southern dynasties (420-479), with capital at Nanjing/also known as Liu Song 劉宋|刘宋
